mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_listen_notes ( LISTENER_ID, SCHOOL_ID, CLASS_NAME, TEACHER_NAME, DISCIPLINE_ID, SUBJECT, SHARE_FLAGE, COMMENTS, PICTURE_PATH, SCORE_ID, LISTENER_PATH, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATA ) VALUE ( #{listenerId}, #{schoolId}, #{className}, #{teacherName}, #{disciplineId}, #{subject}, #{shareFlag}, #{comments}, #{picturePath}, #{scoreId}, #{listenPath}, #{createUserId}, NOW() )
